author: Avi Meir
title: How startups should navigate the business travel shutdown
description: COVID-19 has left few industries untouched. For startups, these are uncertain times and with the outlook changing daily, it can be hard to know what course of action to take. One of the sectors to have been most comprehensively stopped in its tracks is travel…
content:
COVID-19 has left few industries untouched. For startups, these are uncertain times and with the outlook changing daily, it can be hard to know what course of action to take.
